experience.title: AI Security Researcher
experience.description: Conducting research in federated learning security and adversarial machine learning. Developing SignGuard, a novel defense mechanism against poisoning attacks in FL systems, and exploring privacy-preserving AI techniques.
responsibilities: Research and implement Byzantine-resilient federated learning algorithms
Develop cryptographic verification mechanisms for model updates
Design and execute experiments to evaluate defense effectiveness
Document research findings and prepare academic papers
Build comprehensive project portfolios demonstrating research concepts
achievements: Published 2 research papers (Springer LNNS, IEEE ICoDSA)
Designed SignGuard: Multi-layer defense for federated learning
Built production-ready AI systems with 8.45/10 average quality score
